import React, { useState } from "react" import API from "../../utils/API" function PtInitForm() { const [ptInit, setPtInit] = useState({ respondingUnit:"", ETA:"", criticalWarn:"" }) function handleInputChange(event) { console.log(event.target.name) const { name, value } = event.target setPtInit({ ...ptInit, [name]: value }) } function handleSubmit(event) { event.preventDefault() console.log(ptInit) // API.createPatient(ptInit) } return (
{/* */}
) } export default PtInitForm
